it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.lucene

Class LuceneHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.lucene.LuceneHelper

  • public class LuceneHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    LuceneHelper provides utilities for indexing, retrieving, and ranking Wikipedia articles.
    Author:
    Diego Ceccarelli Created on Aug 27, 2013

                           int wikiId)
        Returns the TFIDF-similarity between a given string and an article
        Parameters:
        query - - the query containing the query to compare with the article
        wikiId - - the id of the article to compare with the query
        Returns:
        the TFIDF-similarity between the query and wikiId

      • getCosineSimilarity

        public double getCosineSimilarity(int x,
                                  int y)
        Returns the cosine similarity between two documents
        Parameters:
        x - - the WikiId of the first document
        y - - the WikiId of the first document
        Returns:
        a double between 0 (not similar) and 1 (same content), representing the similarity between the 2 documents

      • getCosineSimilarity

        public double getCosineSimilarity(int x,
                                  int y,
                                  java.lang.String field)
        Returns the cosine similarity between two documents
        Parameters:
        x - - the WikiId of the first document
        y - - the WikiId of the first document
        field - - the field on which to compute the similarity
        Returns:
        a double between 0 (not similar) and 1 (same content), representing the similarity between the 2 documents

      • tfidfVector

        private double tfidfVector(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> tfidf,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> freq,
                           java.lang.String field)
        Builds the TFIDF vector and its norm2
        Parameters:
        tfidf - - the vector containing for each term its TFIDF score, it will be populated by this method
        freq - - the vector containing for each term its frequency
        field - - the field on which to compute the inverse document frequency
        Returns:
        the norm of the TFIDF vector

      • query

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> query(java.lang.String query,
                                               java.lang.String field,
                                               int n)
        Parameters:
        query - entities containing the text of the query as a phrase (terms consecutive) will be be returned.
        field - the field where the query must be performed (summary, content, title ..).
        n - the max number of results to produce.
        Returns:
        the top wiki-id matching the query

      • query

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> query(java.lang.String query,
                                               java.lang.String field)
        Parameters:
        query - entities containing the text of the query as a phrase (terms consecutive) will be be returned.
        field - the field where the query must be performed (summary, content, title ..).
        n - the max number of results to produce.
        Returns:
        the top wiki-id matching the query (returns max 10000 wiki-id );

      • rankBySimilarity

        public void rankBySimilarity(SpotMatch spot,
                             EntityMatchList eml,
                             java.lang.String context,
                             java.lang.String field)
        Sorts a list of entities by their similarity with the string context.
        Parameters:
        spot - - the spot for which the entities are sorted
        eml - - the entity list to sort
        context - - the context text, entities are sorted based on their similarity with the context.
        field - - sort the entity based on the similarity between their text in this field and the context.

      • rankBySimilarity

        public void rankBySimilarity(SpotMatch spot,
                             EntityMatchList eml,
                             java.lang.String context)
        Sorts a list of entities by their similarity (full text) with the string context.
        Parameters:
        spot - - the spot for which the entities are sorted
        eml - - the entity list to sort
        context - - the context text, entities are sorted based on their similarity with the context.
